content:
# I have moved to a valid position where I can place the stone furnace.
# Now I will attempt to place the stone furnace at this new position.

furnace = place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=valid_furnace_position)  # Place the stone furnace at the valid position.
assert furnace, "Failed to place the stone furnace."  # Assert to ensure the furnace was placed successfully.
print(f"Furnace placed at {furnace.position}.")  # Indicate the position of the placed furnace.
